Package net.mcreator.themes

Class Theme

java.lang.Object
net.mcreator.themes.Theme
public class Theme extends Object

A Theme can change images MCreator will use and redefine the colors and the style of BlocklyPanel and RSyntaxTextAreaStyler by creating a new ColorScheme

.

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public String getID()
      The ID is the theme's registry name. It is used to differentiate each theme in the code. This ID is also the main folder's name of the theme.
      Returns:

      The theme's ID

    • setID

      public void setID(String id)
      This method sets the id of this theme using the name of its main folder.
      Parameters:
      id -

      The theme's ID

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:

      Its displayed name

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns:

      A description displayed in the ThemesPanel if provided.

    • getCredits

      @Nullable public String getCredits()
      Returns:

      A String with optional credits to give to someone.

    • getVersion

      @Nullable public String getVersion()
      Returns:

      The theme's version if provided

    • getFontSize

      public int getFontSize()

      The main font size changes the size of the text for the main font. Usually, this parameter should not be changed except if the font is too big or too small with the default value.

      Returns:

      The main font size

    • getDefaultFont

      public String getDefaultFont()
      Returns:
      The default font to use with some languages.

    • useDefaultFontForSecondary

      public boolean useDefaultFontForSecondary()
      Returns:

      Use the default font as the main font

    • getColorScheme

      public ColorScheme getColorScheme()

      This methods gets the ColorScheme to use with the theme

      Returns:
      Returns the ColorScheme of the Theme if one is defined. If the Theme does not create a new ColorScheme, the Dark's theme ColorScheme will be used.

    • getIcon

      public ImageIcon getIcon()
      This icon is only with ThemesPanel.
      Returns:

      An ImageIcon representing the plugin.

    • setIcon

      public void setIcon(ImageIcon icon)

      To be detected, the name of the image file needs to be "icon.png" located into the main folder.

      Parameters:
      icon -

      An ImageIcon to display in ThemesPanel

      public String toString()
